QueryResult.text: SELECT ta.id team_def_member_key, ta.id clarity_team_def_member_key, td.id team_def_key, td.name team_def_name, ta.code team_def_member_id, ta.resource_id resource_key, r.unique_name resource_id, r.full_name resource_name, ta.allocation * 100 allocation_pct, ta.last_updated_date clarity_updated_date, ta.created_date clarity_created_date FROM team_def_allocations ta INNER JOIN team_definitions td ON ta.team_def_id = td.id LEFT OUTER JOIN srm_resources r ON ta.resource_id = r.id WHERE 1=1
